A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars aside\, this was just a bad movie. It felt so contrived and Disnified. There were too many long unnecessary story arcs and others that were totally underdeveloped. The writing was sloppy\, confusing\, and several times broke canon. And every single redeeming moment was awkwardly punctuated by cringe worthy humor that made me bury my face in my hands. I felt like I was watching a bad marvel movie. I will not be watching any further star wars films and I am astonished that this mess was given such a high rating by critics when it's not even a good movie\, let alone a good star wars. It was like watching a parody of a star wars film. Blech\, it's going to take a while to rinse the bad taste from my mouth.
